name: monorepo
description: A GUI Agent application based on UI-TARS(Vision-Lanuage Model) that allows you to control your computer using natural language.
author: ByteDance

scripts.check:lsp:probe: pnpm run check:lsp:probe:ts && pnpm run check:lsp:probe:json && pnpm run check:lsp:probe:yaml && pnpm run check:lsp:probe:markdown
scripts.check:lsp:fallback: pnpm --filter @ui-tars/sdk exec tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.json && biome check docs/reliability/setup/tooling-setup-lock.json && python -m yamllint --strict ../.agents/skills/e2e-testing-patterns/agents/openai.yaml && pnpm exec prettier --check README.md
scripts.check:ast:baseline: pnpm exec ast-grep --version && pnpm exec jscodeshift --version && node -e "require('jsonc-parser');"
scripts.check:plugins:baseline: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const d=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('docs/reliability/setup/tooling-setup-lock.json','utf8'));const p=d?.domains?.plugins;if(!p)process.exit(1);const req=['opencode-shell-strategy','opencode-worktree','opencode-notifier','commit-commands','security-guidance'];const m=new Map((p.mandatory||[]).map(x=>[x.id,x]));for(const id of req){const v=m.get(id);if(!v||!v.version||v.runtimeStatus!=='applied')process.exit(1);}if(!Array.isArray(p.denylist)||p.denylist.length===0)process.exit(1);if(Array.isArray(p.gaps)&&p.gaps.length>0)process.exit(1);"
scripts.check:setup:baseline: pnpm run check:tooling-lock && pnpm run check:lsp:probe && pnpm run check:lsp:fallback && pnpm run check:ast:baseline && pnpm run check:mcp:baseline && pnpm run check:plugins:baseline
